title: Letters to the editor | Pitts doesn’t get it
text:
Published By: Centre Daily Times - Today 
It’s a rare Sunday when I agree with Leonard Pitts Jr. His column, “And now, an ode to guns” (CDT, 10/18), definitely wasn’t one of ...
